Legal_Issue: Was the RAD's application of the reasonableness standard to the RPD's decision appropriate?
Procedural_Context: Judicial review of the RAD's decision
Credibility_Assessment: RPD's credibility findings were deferred to by RAD
Basis_of_Claim: Existence of an internal flight alternative
Application_Error: RAD inappropriately applied the reasonableness standard, preventing reweighing of IFA evidence
Legal_Standard: Standard of review: reasonableness vs. palpable and overriding error
Application_Factor: Deference to RPD on credibility and IFA findings
Decision_Review_Issue: Appropriateness of the standard of review applied by RAD
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: RAD must apply either reasonableness or palpable and overriding error standard when reviewing RPD decisions
Outcome_of_Review: RAD's decision set aside; case remanded for redetermination by a different panel
Evidentiary_Issues: Inability to reweigh evidence due to deferential standard
Procedural_Fairness: Concerns about RAD's failure to properly reassess IFA
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to the standard of review applied by RAD
Relevant_Law: Administrative law principles on standard of review
